name: Blueberry Vanilla Protein Milkshake
description: Weâ€™re not saying milkshakes must be healthier, but these are delicious and pack an extra nutrition punch. The vanilla plant-based protein powder will help keep your blood sugars more stable, and the blueberries are full of antioxidants and fiber.

ingredients.name: each plain 2% Greek yogurt and milk

preparation: Measure ice cream, yogurt, milk, blueberries, and protein blend into a blender.
Blend on high until well incorporated, about 45 sec.
tips: Epicure protein blends are plant-based, made with pea and fava bean protein. Make vegan milkshakes with vegan ice cream and yogurt.
For an Epic Life friendly dessert, make mini shakes. One shake will serve two Epic friends!
To chill glasses, rinse with cold water and freeze for 10 minutes.
